key_points.text:
Positive Sentiment:
Stock surged to an all-time intraday high on broad industrial sector strength.
Caterpillar Stock Surges to Record High
Positive Sentiment:
Oppenheimer lifted its price target to $483 and maintained an Outperform rating, implying roughly 17% upside from recent levels.

Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE: CAT) shares have rallied amid record highs driven by bullish analyst actions, strong end-market demand for data center and energy infrastructure equipment, and a long track record of dividend increases.

Given New $483.00 Price Target at Oppenheimer
Positive Sentiment:
Jim Cramer highlighted data center and energy infrastructure spending as key tailwinds for Caterpillar’s equipment division.

Investors noted CAT’s 31st consecutive annual dividend hike, reinforcing its appeal to income-focused portfolios.
All-Time High & Analyst Upgrades
Neutral Sentiment:
The ongoing industrial rally, signaled by new highs in the Industrial Sector SPDR (XLI), boosted CAT alongside peers like Deere.
